website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic Angry Birds toy for anyone who loves the video games, especially since these huggable Blue Birds could’ve been pulled straight from the app.
pros: Blue Bird looks and sounds just like he does in the game
Chirpy game sounds aren’t too noisy
cons: You can’t replace the batteries once they wear out

customer_reviews.title: Great Plush But Late Delivery
customer_reviews.text: This product took a very long time to arrive and I even payed extra for it to arrive quicker. So if you’re buying last minute or for a birthday, I recommend to purchase it a few weeks in advance. And on top of that, it doesn’t have a tracker, so I was unaware of where my package was. As for the product itself, it’s very good quality, and very soft. Looks good, feels good, about the right size and it’s just about what you would want in an angry bird plush.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for an angry bird collection!
customer_reviews.text: My 4yr old son loves angry birds, and has amassed quite the collection of toys. I got this for his birthday and he loves it. He also got a larger 12" version thats the exact same. Both make noise, but you have to hit them (throw them against something) really hard. It can be difficult sometimes to make it sound - but it's not like he minds throwing it around trying :-). Have had the toy for about 6 months. Stands up to light dog abuse, and heavy playing w/ a child (ie not of cheap construction). All in all a great angry birds toy, for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Cian F

customer_reviews.title: Its a fun little plush toy for a fad
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my nephew who loves the game. I got him the red one at first because, well, its the famous angry bird. He wasn't having any of it and wanted the black or blue one. I ended up getting every color plus the green pig for him because I didn't want to hear it. The kid is so spoiled. That being said, they weren't terribly expensive for what they are and they are fun to toss around. Ended up making little forts with him and throwing the bird plushies across the room trying to knock them down.
customer_reviews.author: Alex D

customer_reviews.title: So incredibly pleased. Blue is so soft & adorable
customer_reviews.text: So incredibly pleased. Blue is so soft & adorable, really well made. This seller is phenomenal, super fast shipping, great communication, packaged perfectly for shipping. Bought this as a Christmas present for my 7 year old son who is severely autistic & absolutely LOVES the angry birds, will post a pic after he opens it to show scale & quality. Love this seller & will always check to see if they have any future purchases before I check anywhere else. Thank you so so so very much ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Blue Bird!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this (along with 4 other characters) for my 5 year old son who just loves angry birds .. he absolutely loves it! It's the perfect size to fit in his hand to throw (ouch! lol). The product itself is very well made and looks durable. It is very soft and plush and great for a collection. The only thing I was a little disappointed in was that the sound for all the birds is the same, even though they are different in the game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aaden's Angry Bird
customer_reviews.text: Great Auntie Carol came through for my great-nephew Aaden because he asked his Mom and Grandmother for a "blue" Angry Bird and they told him they don't make blue ones. I was on a quest until I open the Amazon's e-mail and there it was a "blue" Angry Bird; how perfect. My nephrew simply loves his Angry Bird and especially the blue one that Great Auntie Carol sent him.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Fine product unless you order multiples
customer_reviews.text: The item itself is fine. However I ordered 3 from same item. Received 2 that were identical and the sound worked, but the 3rd one looked different than the others and the sound doesn't work at all! We must've gotten an older version one.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina A. Croy

customer_reviews.title: It's cute.
customer_reviews.text: My lab LOVES these. I bought a variety of them b/c the sounds drive her crazy. They were quite fun, but hardly lasted a half an hour. I gave it 3 stars b/c it is cute and makes funny sounds and probably would be a fun trinket for a kid. I knew this was not a dog toy, but that's what I got it for. I got mine cheap as most were way overpriced for a stuffed animal.
customer_reviews.author: BABetty

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for someone who loves angry birds games.
customer_reviews.text: The toy is soft to the touch and not heavy at all. What I thought was disappointing was that fact that they all make the exact same sounds. You would have thought that each color would make a sound unique to that bird like they do in the game. I bought the others, white, red, toucan, orange, yellow, and blue, and they all have the same exact recording. Well I bought these for the kids and they don't seem to mind and they enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Angry bird squishy
customer_reviews.text: A soft, squishy bird that is well made and looks just like the Angry Bird character from the game. I purchased this for my classroom to be used for a game I had made. The sounds made it fun for the kids when they threw him, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Fun plush toy, now how do I turn off the sound?
customer_reviews.text: Actually, the angry bird sound isn't that loud (almost have to hold it up to your ear), so that isn't an issue (for which I am grateful). Seems similar in construction to other plush animals my daughters have. They love their angry birds.
customer_reviews.author: NMKings

customer_reviews.title: Cute Bird, but...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toy for Christmas 2011. This is a cute stuffed animal, but the stitching has already come out of the back of the toy (i.e., a big string came out of it - it did not rip; and it was not abused or treated roughly). So, there's a nice size hole in it. Luckily, I know how to sew. I wouldn't purchase this toy again.
customer_reviews.author: LHS

customer_reviews.title: angry blue bird
customer_reviews.text: The kids like the blue bird, its fun to throw around, soft, and makes fun noises (although initially a little tricky to activate the sound for the little ones) The novelty seemed to wear off pretty quickly, it still comes out once in a while, but I was hoping this would have more entertainment value.
customer_reviews.author: Check'M

customer_reviews.title: Defective. Only worked for 5 days.
customer_reviews.text: Given to my son for his birthday the day after it arrived. He LOVED it and played with it (pushed the button to make the sounds) a few times. Then the sound completely stopped working 4 days later. He's very disappointed, and so am I.
customer_reviews.author: andimay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My nephew enjoyed this toy. The sound effects work amazing and still work after 1 year after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Angry Birds, so we ordered this and a few others. He absolutely loved them. He created his own Angry Birds game, and he set up blocks with the pig and threw the birds. He had a great time with them, so it was definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KristenTag

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this. It was a wonderful stocking stuffer. I got each one a different color bird. The sounds are great and they seem to be quality material. I know some stuffed animals you pick up and can tell this is going to break in a week. I did not get that feeling from these birds. So we shall see, just don't through them as the sound maker hurts.
customer_reviews.author: R. White

customer_reviews.title: Collection
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't figure why my 11 yr old grandson wanted this for Xmas this year. I just bought him a Red Angry Bird last year. I thought I remember seeing one of these blue Angry Birds in his room at home. I questioned his choice of having a second blue Angry Bird. His answer was, I want the blue one again because my beagle puppy ate my other blue Angry Bird.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. JBN

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I would first like to thank our seller, the items arrived within 3 days and we live in Germany! It was amazing to receive them so quickly. The items are exactly as described and although a little too small they are so much fun. I personally like the 8 inch over the 5 inch but my son has figured out a way to use both sizes to his advantage.
customer_reviews.author: Martie

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fun stuffed animal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3-year old niece, who really enjoys "playing" Angry Birds on her mom's phone - really she just likes the sound the slingshot makes when you play with it. She took to this guy right away and carried it around all day, it was really cute. She really likes the sound it makes.
customer_reviews.author: Rob R

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy.
customer_reviews.text: This angry bird was delivered promptly and in good condition. My grandson was disappointed it didnt talk but that was my fault for not reading the description more carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Kay

customer_reviews.title: Another angry bird..,
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is in to Angry Birds right now and has no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Who Me?
customer_reviews.text: I bought a series of these perfect little guys for my son to have Angry Bird Battles and he loves them. They are perfect for throwing in the house, well made and the seller was excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Dedrianne G. H. Burgueno

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in person
customer_reviews.text: This Blue one looks droopy in the picture, but when you get to hold the bird in your own hand, it's looks a lot better. The sound is standard/same as the other color Angry Birds (I have yellow and black too). The battery is Non-replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: AverageGuyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Birds are "cheap" : Sound is apparently optional.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 of the Birds. The blue one was broken with no sound. Not worth hassle to return for that, but obviously very cheaply made. They all make the same sound too, and it's not very loud. Probably low batteries on the ones that actually work. Also, no way to replace any battery. If you have an angry bird lover, it's OK but these are expensive given how small they are and the fact the sound doesn't even work on all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: I'm not angry about this purchase! lol
customer_reviews.text: Saved a few bucks buying this online for my daughter. She loves Angry Birds and wanted this blue bird. But I wasn't willing to pay $12-15 in a store for it. Glad I found it on here! Just like what you'd find in any store, just cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon In Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice if you like Angry Birds!
customer_reviews.text: One of my 7th grade students collects these and when he demonstrated amazing growth and progress this school year, I told him to tell me about one of these critters he still wanted and he is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Storm Watcher

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several Angry Birds plush toys for series we are doing at church. They all arrived quickly and are great quality. The kids will love them. I was unable to find this product for a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: mrssischo

customer_reviews.title: Another Cute Angry Bird!
customer_reviews.text: Once again I am reviewing an Angry Bird product! They are really cute and my grandchildren love them...they think of creative ways to launch these. I think any child who has played Angry Birds would love one of these cuddly plush toys.
customer_reviews.author: KatoKat

customer_reviews.title: Great Collectible....
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love these.....have them all. It is fun to watch them and how they arrange each one. Play time ( and night time, yes they have them in their beds too). Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: great and sturdy so far
customer_reviews.text: These angry birds are so cool. It makes the same noise as the game and is very soft. They make great hide and seek toys and even better when you line them all up and play real life angry birds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Angry Birds plush
customer_reviews.text: I have the whole bunch of these angry birds plush toys atleast 7 of them, they are all good but makes exactly same noise except the piggy which is not a huge problem, all in all they are good solid plush toys.
customer_reviews.author: Addi

customer_reviews.title: Little enough to love
customer_reviews.text: This toy was made well and endured the punishment being loved to death by an infant. I was really impressed by the shape and the quality of this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Wine

customer_reviews.title: Angry Birds Plush 5-Inch Blue Bird with Sound
customer_reviews.text: This dopey fellow is loved by our daughter so regardless of what I think of the bird the only thing that really matters is what the young daughter thinks and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Angry Birds Fun
customer_reviews.text: The kids love these. Lots of fun playing real life Angry Birds with sound included. Very cute. Have purchased several different birds.
customer_reviews.author: C. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy! I just think it's a little bit pricy for the size.
customer_reviews.author: leosanch81

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my grandson who is crazy about angry birds. He plays with these, building towers with blocks and then throwing the plush birds at his structures.
customer_reviews.author: clms

customer_reviews.title: Small, yet soft enough for a baby
customer_reviews.text: 5 inches just isn't 5 inches any more. Looks just like the game and sounds great. The baby loves to chew on its nose and his older brother loves to throw it around.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Angry Bird makes little boy smile...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. He was estastic when I gave it to him because he really loves Angry Birds. Named him "Blue" and made a home for "Blue" in his room.
customer_reviews.author: C.J. in Fayetteville

customer_reviews.title: finally a sale price
customer_reviews.text: My grandson's love angry birds but the price of this stuff!?! I bought the birds on sale so they could create their own games with their blocks and launch these at them. This works for 3 brothers!
customer_reviews.author: mystery fan

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my son an Angry Birds bedroom set and I thought these would be a fun addition. They are a good size, soft and make cute noises when you sqeeze them... I think he will love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kristenxavier

customer_reviews.title: We were both pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter wanted the blue bird to add to her collection. We were both pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: My grandson has fun throwing it
customer_reviews.text: Cute little stuffie. My grandson has fun throwing it around
customer_reviews.author: Mary McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these 5 inch plushies, I bought 5 different ones. They are all great! The quality was better than I was expecting; they are very soft, cute and cuddly. The sounds are fun. :)
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son, he's crazy about Angry Birds. The toy is very soft, and great for kids. The sound feature is a small button located in the forehead of the bird. My only concern is that it can be a little tricky for young children to get the sound to work at first. A plus for parents is that the noise it makes is relatively quiet, so it's not as irritating as some of the really loud toys out there these days. Overall, lots of fun and very cute!
customer_reviews.author: WorkingForRetirement

customer_reviews.title: A three-year-old's dream come true
customer_reviews.text: My three-year old absolutely loves tossing these at block towers he's created. He loves the sounds it makes as well! Sounds just like the game.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hallman

customer_reviews.title: This bird was mad angry, yo.
customer_reviews.text: You would be too if UPS were throwing you around for the past couple days. He calmed down a bit once I pet him and gave him a shot of vodka.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Corbett

customer_reviews.title: So Cute
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This is a really good looking plush very durable. I would recommend it to any Angry Birds fans.
customer_reviews.author: Volcha

customer_reviews.title: Great for a present
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Gift last year... my son loves it and the sound is better than expected. Great buy the young ones who love Angry birds.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Cute, perfect size, great price! My kids loved this Angry Bird and it's volume of noise is enough for them to like it and not to drive Mom crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Di

customer_reviews.title: It is what it says
customer_reviews.text: It rates five stars because it is exactly what the description tells you it is. If your kid is an Angry Birds fanatic, you're golden.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Angry Birds Plush
customer_reviews.text: Great little toys that are cute and make noise. I bought a bunch of these for my daughter and they are fun to throw around and goof off with.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as Grab-Bag Giveaway
customer_reviews.text: S-o-o-o-o cute. Great toss-around toy with lots of characters to choose from. Love the concept and originality. Love this item.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J. King

customer_reviews.title: Cute plush for the Angry bird fan!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old was sooooo happy to get this for his birthday, my 11 and 8 year old were a bit jealous! It is a great size, not too little by any means, but also not huge. It is soft, squishy and just perfect in details and colors! The noisemaker is not very big so he may have to search a bit to find it, but it also is not clunky when he wants to cuddle with the plush!
customer_reviews.author: T. Distaso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it but I wish I would have bought 2 more lol!!
customer_reviews.author: Lolli

customer_reviews.title: Both of my great grandsons LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: The added sound w/this toy delights both of the boys. I highly recommend it for ages 2 thru 7. AND it's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie Bossert

customer_reviews.title: Angry Bird Trophy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Angry Bird for my wife who loves Angry Bird games and she loved it. She loved the sound it makes even more.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban

customer_reviews.title: My son is very happy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his blue bird! He loves all the Angry Birds! He is a big fan of the games, toys and plushies! He keeps asking for more.
customer_reviews.author: H. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for little kids who like the game
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately, this little guy doesn't break apart into three and destroy pets or furniture when launched inside! :-). My son is a huge fan of the game and enjoys playing with these things.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: She is 5 and really into Angry Birds and just loved it this Christmas. It makes 3 diff sounds, I think. She has brought it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: HNavratil

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this plush, it was just what he wanted for Christmas. He was very happy and excited to recieve this as a gift, perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Gissell Bueno

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Angry Birds for dogs I pet sit for and they love them. Best money spent on my friends.
customer_reviews.author: J. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my little brother and he loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Angry Bird
customer_reviews.text: The Angry Birds toy is cute, soft, looks like the "angry bird", makes the proper sounds for an "angry bird" and is fun to play with. It doesn't need to be educational because it is entertaining. Even adults can enjoy this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Book enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: OOOOlakaola!
customer_reviews.text: My kid laughs with glee as this thing is hurdlered towards my face. Soft enough that it doesn't cause injury.
customer_reviews.author: CurlyK

customer_reviews.title: Angry Birds Plush Toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun little toy, especially for people who are fans of the ultra-popular game. This toy is nice and soft, and just the right size for throwing. The button that triggers the sound is located on the bird's forehead, and it's really easy to push it while throwing. Let's be real - there is no educational value here, and this is nothing you can't live without...but if you like the game, this is a fun little gift for all ages, and worth the minimal cost.
customer_reviews.author: B. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: kids love it
customer_reviews.text: my son ordered this and he loves it. its a good size especially if you are collecting the whole set
customer_reviews.author: Luthien

customer_reviews.title: Blue Bird
customer_reviews.text: Love the bird and so do the kids it makes a lot of noise and it makes for a fun play time.
customer_reviews.author: Joscelyne

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it! You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This blue bird is SO cute! It is soft and well made. My kids love it! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: lerjhunt

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son and he was very happy to receive it. He likes playing with it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for very happy nephews who love anything Angry Birds! Lots of fun & from their reaction, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Magee

customer_reviews.title: I am NOT angry about this purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old Angry Birds fan loved it. I was exactly what we expected. A fun little toy .
customer_reviews.author: BigTexMan

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a Christmas gift for a child. It's cute and well made and the size was perfect to play with.
customer_reviews.author: WhatMeWorry

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy
customer_reviews.text: Good toy Arrived on time It works The kids love it Ja ja ja It was the second i bought
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Its a toy
customer_reviews.text: You will have to refer to my three year old for a proper review of this product. Sorry but he's busy right now but I know the dogs have been eyeing it too.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Another collection for my boy. He enjoys the sound and the size of the plush is what he likes also.
customer_reviews.author: Ana G. Saravia

customer_reviews.title: Great Toys!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase and the toys. They shipped on time and were great quality. It made a very good Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: thay love it..
customer_reviews.text: i bought it for my nephews and thay love it to much, liked the sound that the toy make definitely i will buy this again.

customer_reviews.title: cute and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: this was a gift for my son. he loves it. it makes noise and he's been having lots of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: vegas-mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Well packaged! Would definitely recommend seller and would definitely be a repeat customer! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice plush
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this stuffed birds head. I personally don't get it, but this is the hot item now for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: edmir

customer_reviews.title: loving angry bird
customer_reviews.text: Great pet for my son who is crazy about angry birds and has about 4 already. everything is great, arrived in good time.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: The famous bird
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my grandson wanted, and he will be pleased to get it for his birthday which is themed Angry Birds!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It's an angry bird! Kids love it! I can't believe how much they love it. Holy cow three more words
customer_reviews.author: mikeblittle

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: These birds were great for the kids. A big hit. They are durable, the kids travel with them. The sound is authentic and not loud enough to be annoying. A good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: ncmom

customer_reviews.title: Everything that I expected
customer_reviews.text: The sounds are pretty cool and the kids love launching it around the house. $10 bucks is a lot to pay for a small stuffed animal. My 3 year old and 5 year old counted out the money from their piggy banks to pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: David Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Angry Bird Craze
customer_reviews.text: Bought all five birds for my grown son's b-day. He loves them! Just the right size, and the sound effects are hysterical! Squawk!
customer_reviews.author: LadyBraveHeart

customer_reviews.title: angry birds 5 inch plush toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson asked for this stuffed animal as one of his Xmas wish list and his mom thinks he will be very happy and that's what Xmas is about happy children.
customer_reviews.author: pam mattia

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and adorable.
customer_reviews.text: When i got this it was a little bigger then i expected it to be. Make exact sound as in the game and is very cute. You can throw it at a wall and it will makethe noise. Perfect gift for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Vo

customer_reviews.title: ... our grandson and he loves Angry Birds so will love it.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for our grandson and he loves Angry Birds so will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Carlton

customer_reviews.title: excellent toy for little fans of angry birds
customer_reviews.text: This toy is a great toy for any kid that is into angry birds. It makes three separate noises. It is durable and safe for kids of all ages. If they make the other birds I plan on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Collins

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: ordered this for our daughter. exactly as described. will be ordering more of these in the near future. the squeaky sound still lasts after many months!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Small and not very interesting.
customer_reviews.text: Small. Requested by my 5 yr. old, who is an Angry Birds lover. He opened it and put it aside and he doesn't play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Now my siblings are very happy to play with this plush toy
customer_reviews.text: It really came as said. Now my siblings are very happy to play with this plush toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Makes Angry Bird noises when one pushes the spot at the forehead area. My son loves this.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lee

customer_reviews.title: my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Angry bird toys are my sons love. He is thrilled, he loves it. He enjoys his angry birds we plan on adding to his collection soon.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas, she loved it, it matched the night gown I bought her. She likes angry birds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hentschell

customer_reviews.title: so cute
customer_reviews.text: love the blue color..another angry bird to add to my grandson's collection..xmas gift he loved..so adorable on his bed..thanks..love him
customer_reviews.author: mary j zambito

customer_reviews.title: Angry Birds ROCK!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Angry Birds and is collecting them all. The shipment was fast and the product much cheaper than buying in the store! Thanks for being quick to ship as she cannot wait to get her items in the mail!!
customer_reviews.author: Vikki Godet

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was just as described. Thank you! My kiddos love it & the sound completely cracks them up. Well made too!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Budd

product_meta.title: Angry Birds Plush 5-Inch Blue Bird with Sound
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Angry Birds is the #1 app worldwide and has been downloaded over 100 million times. Angry Birds plush bring the characters you love onscreen into your arms. Incredibly soft and with the authentic sounds from the game, a must for every Angry Birds fan. Officially licensed product. Squeeze the top to hear authentic sounds from the game. Incredibly soft plush. For ages 1 and up.
feature_bullets: Angry Birds is the #1 application worldwide and has been downloaded over 100 million times
Squeeze the top to hear authentic sounds from the game
